metadata.dc:title: Cholinergic interneurons in the striatum - Single cell patch clamp recordings
metadata.dc:description:
The study entails the collection of single cell patch-clamp recordings, done in conjunction with morphological reconstructions, from cholinergic interneurons in the striatum.
**Embargo status:** *This dataset is temporarily under embargo. The data will become available for download after the embargo period.*
metadata.dc:subject: neuroscience
DAB
Reconstruction
NEUROLUCIDA
metadata.dc:creator: Grillner, Sten
